mapper.select: CREATE TABLE `user` ( `uid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '初始注册的id', `phone` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '电话，根据电话进行登录', `telphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '座机', `password` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '密码', `userType` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '注册者的类型，1商户，2生产商', `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '公司地址', `deliveryaddress` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '收货地址', `bank` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `banknum` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `accountname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '开户名称', `dengji` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `accountmanager` int(11) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上游业务员', `otherusername` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '其他联系人姓名', `otheruserphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '其他联系人电话', `taxidennum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '纳税人识别号', `taxheader` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发票抬头', `authentication` int(11) DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '认证', `invenaddress` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `photo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `errormsg` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tardy` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `picistaust` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `maijialiuyan` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhucetime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xianshikehu` int(11) DEFAULT '2', `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `updateinven` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `leftnav` int(11) DEFAULT '2', `yufukuan` double(12,6) DEFAULT '0.000000', `edu` double(36,6) DEFAULT '0.000000', `zhangkuanzongji` double(36,6) DEFAULT '0.000000', `pinpainame` longtext, `xiliename` longtext, `kucunname` longtext, `xianshijiage` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `yonghubeizhu` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `beizhutime` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `qianguazhangleiji` double DEFAULT '0', `shouhuodizhi` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `paymethod` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ip` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `isphone` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `dingdanuser` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kehuname` longtext, `bumenname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `baobiao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `chuanzhen` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `headphoto` longtext, `miaoshu` longtext, `leftcaidan` longtext, `rightcaidan` longtext, `company` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `dbid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `istuijianren` varchar(255) DEFAULT '否', `fukuantime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `isfukuan` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`uid`), UNIQUE KEY `usernameandphone` (`phone`,`username`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=83 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='客户以及供应商的表'

CREATE TABLE `shop_order` ( `xhid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '一组订单的id', `jxsid` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '下单人的id', `shoptime` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '下单时间', `tax` int(11) NOT NULL, `ddtype` int(11) NOT NULL, `datanotnull` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '判断这个组订单有没有订单', `shopstatus` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '1还没有接受，2已经接受，3历史订单', `zilaid` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '自己提货为：2，发货为：1', `chuinventime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tardystatus` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `allprice` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `shoukuan` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `beizhu` longtext, `kehuname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kehuphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `daixia` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `xianhuoheji` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `fucaiheji` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `orderzhihao` longtext, `weight` double(12,0) DEFAULT '0', `dayin` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `yincang` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `caigou` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `shopmadandayin` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `miaoshu` longtext, `zhaiyao` longtext, `productlocation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `baocunfahuorenname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `baocunfahuorenphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `baocuntitle` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `baocunshouhuorenname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `baocunshouhuorenphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `baocunzhidanren` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `songhuodayin` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `biaojijiaji` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `isfukuan` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `orderaccountid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`xhid`), KEY `jxsidkey` (`jxsid`), CONSTRAINT `jxsidkey` FOREIGN KEY (`jxsid`) REFERENCES `user` (`uid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2098 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='用他的id来确定哪些订单是一组的，即同一个人同时下得订单。'

CREATE TABLE `sport_order` ( `ddid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '订单id', `xxid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '库存id', `xhid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '这些订单和一个序号进行关联着，来确定此订单隶属于哪个订单组中', `tardyid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `productnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '批次', `sportsquarenum` double(255,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '平米数', `sportsquarenumstring` varchar(255) DEFAULT '0*0', `tax` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '是否税票', `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '收货地址', `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发货时间', `liuyan` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '留言', `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态', `jxsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '经销商id', `yuanyin` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '原因', `gysid` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '供应商id', `realsportsquare` double(255,2) DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '实际发货量', `allprice` double(255,2) DEFAULT NULL, `unitprice` double(255,2) DEFAULT NULL, `productfromlocation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '订单出库地址', `wuliuname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `wlnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `wlphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sportyajin` double(255,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `sportyukuan` double(255,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `sportzila` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchantime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `chuinventime` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `getmoneystary` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `realallprice` double(255,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `taxstatus` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `sportorderstatus` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `accountmanagerid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `tardystatus` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `maijialiuyan` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xianhuoandfucai` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `allonekcid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shouhuoren` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shouhuophone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kehuname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kehuphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `kuwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `orderbeizhu` varchar(2555) DEFAULT '', `chengbenjia` double(24,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `chengbenjine` double(24,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `lirui` double(24,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `qianguazhang` double(24,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `jiedantime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `weight` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `zhihaoid` longtext, `allcases` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `allweight` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `danwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT '/平米', `jiekuantime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kaipiaojine` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `moreprice` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `juanshu` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `yincang` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `liruibianhong` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `caigou` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `carpaihao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhihaodayin` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `biaoqian` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `caijianmishu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `yuanmishu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `alljiage` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ruku` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `madandayintime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sportorderguige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sportorderproductname` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `jingshouren` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pian` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `kehuxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `jiezhuanyufukuanprice` double DEFAULT '0', `shiyongyufukuanprice` double DEFAULT '0', `molingprice` double(255,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `productlocation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ddid`), KEY `xhidkey` (`xhid`), CONSTRAINT `xhidkey` FOREIGN KEY (`xhid`) REFERENCES `shop_order` (`xhid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2561 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='现货订单表，用来记录每一个订单'

CREATE TABLE `accountmanager` ( `accountmanagerid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `accountmanagername` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `accountmanagerphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`accountmanagerid`,`accountmanagername`), UNIQUE KEY `accountmanagername` (`accountmanagername`,`logo`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `banci` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `banciname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `baosunbaoyi` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `productnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `squarenumstring` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhaiyao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kcid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `zhihaoid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhihaosquarestring` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhihaoinfo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `productlocation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=25 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `beiyin` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `beiyinname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `biaomianguangze` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `biaomianguangzedu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `bumen` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `bumenname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `butie` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `butiejine` double DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `context` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `context` longtext, `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `summary` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `photo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `yueduliang` int(11) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `customorder` ( `dzid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '定制订单id', `neworderspeid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `dzddtype` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '定制订单的类型', `photo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '图片路径', `backcheck` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '背底选择', `length` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '长度', `width` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '宽度', `squarenum` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '平米数', `reallysquarenum` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `mingxi` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengtime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '生产周期', `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '地址', `newliuyan` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '留言', `jxsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '经销商id、下单人id', `gysid` varchar(11) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '哪个文员处理的这个订单', `newyuanyin` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `price` double(255,11) DEFAULT NULL, `yajinprice` double(255,11) DEFAULT '0.00000000000', `yukuanprice` double(255,11) DEFAULT '0.00000000000', `allprice` double(255,11) DEFAULT NULL, `ordernewstatus` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `ordertax` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `zila` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `wuliunum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `wuliuname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `wuliuphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchantime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `realallprice` double(255,11) DEFAULT NULL, `getmoneystary` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `taxstatus` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `chuinventime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `customorderstatus` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `accountmanagerid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `maijialiuyan` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `chengbenjia` double(24,12) DEFAULT NULL, `chengbenjine` double(24,12) DEFAULT NULL, `lirui` double(24,12) DEFAULT NULL, `qianguazhang` double(24,12) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dzid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=33 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `daojiao` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `daojiaoname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `diaohuoorderzi` ( `zuid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `orderziid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `productinid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `xxid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `newkcid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `squarenum` double DEFAULT '0', `squarenumstring` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `productlocation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `productnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhihaoid` longtext, `zhihaoinfo` longtext, `oldproductlocation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhishu` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `madandayintime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `madandayinstatus` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`orderziid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=81 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `diaohuoorderzu` ( `orderzuid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `productlocation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `dayintime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `dayinstatus` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `zhaiyao` longtext, `oldproductlocation` longtext, `beizhu` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', PRIMARY KEY (`orderzuid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=47 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `engineercontext` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'id', `engid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '工程类别id', `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '标题', `jianjie` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '简介', `context` longtext COMMENT '内容', `photopath` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '图片路径', `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `yueduliang` int(11) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `engineering` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'id', `classificationname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '工程案例类别名', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `fangweibiaoqian` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `fangweibiaoqianname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `fatherpurchase` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `productlocation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `allprice` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `summary` longtext, `firmname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `beizhu` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=11 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `feiyong` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhaiyao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kemubianma` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kemuname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `jine` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `paymethod` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pingzhenghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kemutype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `firm` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `firmname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `forphototable` ( `forid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `forphoto` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `forphotostatus` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `gangwei` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `zhiwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `huanjie` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bilv` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchantypename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bili` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `gongshijine` double(12,4) DEFAULT '0.0000', `tuochan` varchar(255) DEFAULT '否', `gangweixianshu` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `ispingfen` varchar(255) DEFAULT '否', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `gangweiguigejine` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gangweiid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `gangweiguige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `jine` double(12,4) DEFAULT NULL, `minjine` double(12,4) DEFAULT NULL, `maxjine` double(12,4) DEFAULT NULL, `centertext` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `allnumjisuan` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `huanjiename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `yawen` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhoudu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `gongjianame` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `getmoneystyle` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `stylename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `grade` ( `dengjiid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `dengjiname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`dengjiid`), UNIQUE KEY `kk` (`dengjiname`,`logo`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `guanlianlingliao` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `huanjieid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `materialxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bumen` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shuliang` double DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `guigeguanlian` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `typename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `jicaiguige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `yuanguige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhoudu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `fenchengpianshu` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=8 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `guigezhongliang` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhoudu` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `zhongliang` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `guigezhongliangname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `huanjiecipin` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `huanjieid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `cipinname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cipinsijisuan` varchar(255) DEFAULT '是', `huanjiename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `huanjiematerialnameguanlian` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `shengchanhuanjiename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchantypename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `material` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bumen` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=16 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `huanjiematerialnameguanliantwo` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `upid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` double DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhoudu` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `huanjietypematerialguanlian` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `shengchanhuanjiename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchantypename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `material` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bumen` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kcdizhi` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `danweiname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `huanjietypematerialguanliantwo` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `upid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` double DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhoudu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `huanjiexingguangongxu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `huanjieid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `xingguangongxuname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xingguangongxusijisuan` varchar(255) DEFAULT '是', `huanjiename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `inven_mingxi` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `invenid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `zhihao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tiaoma` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `mishu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `huowei` varchar(255) DEFAULT '空白', `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `timechuo` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `weight` double(11,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhihaobeizhu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `iscaijian` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchantime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `timechuo` (`timechuo`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=50762 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `jicaiguige` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `jicaiguigename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `jichuguige` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `kefutalkreport` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `kehunameone` longtext, `kehuphoneone` longtext, `addressone` longtext, `talkqkone` longtext, `kehunametwo` longtext, `kehuphonetwo` longtext, `addresstwo` longtext, `xinghaotwo` longtext, `numtwo` longtext, `jindutwo` longtext, `xinghaothree` longtext, `kehuphonethree` longtext, `addressthree` longtext, `kuaidithree` longtext, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `kemu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `kemutype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kemubianma` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kemuname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `leibie` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `leibiename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `lianxiwomen` ( `photo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `dizhi` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `dianhua` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `id` int(11) DEFAULT '1' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `material` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `danweiname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `squarenum` double(255,5) DEFAULT '0.00000', `squarenumstring` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `leiji` double(255,5) DEFAULT NULL, `invenwarn` double(255,5) DEFAULT '0.00000', `materialtype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialdaima` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `caigoudanjia` double(255,5) DEFAULT '0.00000', `hanshuidanjia` double(255,5) DEFAULT '0.00000', `materialbeizhu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `caigoujinezongji` double(255,5) DEFAULT '0.00000', `hanshuijinezongji` double(255,5) DEFAULT '0.00000', `kcdizhi` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guanlianxinghao` longtext, `guanlianid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `materialcaigou` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `danweiname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `squarenum` double DEFAULT NULL, `materialtype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialdaima` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `caigoudanjia` double DEFAULT NULL, `hanshuidanjia` double DEFAULT NULL, `kcdizhi` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `isshenhe` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `shenhetime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=11 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `materialorder` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `materialid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '原材料id', `shuoming` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '使用说明', `squarenum` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '领取数量', `squarenumstring` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '明细', `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '领取时间', `getmanname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '领取人', `setmanname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '审核人', `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `bumen` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialorderbeizhu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `caigoudanjia` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `caigouzongjia` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `hanshuidanjia` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `hanshuizongjia` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `ribaoid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `pici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=39 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `midu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `midu` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `mokuai` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `mokuainame` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `peizhi` longtext, `menuData` longtext, `anniuData` longtext, `showData` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `navigation` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `navicontext` longtext, `naviname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `naviphoto` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `peifang` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `peifangname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` double DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bili` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `ispeifangmatchtype` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `pointtable` ( `point` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `product_cz` ( `czid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '材质的id', `czname` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '材质的名称', `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`czid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='同质透心产品的材质表'

CREATE TABLE `product_information` ( `productinid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '产品信息id', `productphoto` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '产品规格id', `productnum` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '产品编号', `productseriesid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `gongyou` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `weight` double DEFAULT '0', `xianhuoandfucai` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `invenbaojing` double(12,2) DEFAULT '500.00', `youwubianhao` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `yincang` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`productinid`,`productnum`), UNIQUE KEY `productnum` (`productnum`), UNIQUE KEY `lianhe` (`productnum`,`productseriesid`), UNIQUE KEY `bky` (`productphoto`,`productnum`,`productseriesid`), KEY `id` (`productinid`), KEY `serieskey` (`productseriesid`), CONSTRAINT `serieskey` FOREIGN KEY (`productseriesid`) REFERENCES `series` (`seriesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=460 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='产品的信息表'

CREATE TABLE `product_inven` ( `kcid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '库存id', `productinid` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '产品信息id', `squarenum` double(255,2) NOT NULL COMMENT '产品库存量，用平米计算', `pici` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '产品的批次', `squarenumstring` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '库存量，线下的方式表示', `productlocation` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '北京' COMMENT '仓储地', `kucunbeizhu` longtext, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `kuwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT '空白', `gongyou` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `allsquare` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `chengbenjia` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `pianshu` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `allcatse` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `weight` double(255,9) DEFAULT '0.000000000', `juanshu` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `newsquarenum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `mingxidanwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT '平米', `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `productname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchantime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `allweight` double(24,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `kehuname` longtext, `tuojian` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `banci` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `biaozhunjian` double DEFAULT '0', `guigecolor` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `beizhucolor` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `liuhuoinfo` longtext, `isbaobiaoupload` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `changyong` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `kehuxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `jiancheng` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `yonghukucunbeizhu` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`kcid`), KEY `xinxi` (`productinid`), CONSTRAINT `xinxi` FOREIGN KEY (`productinid`) REFERENCES `product_information` (`productinid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=25699331 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='产品的库存表\r\n存储信息的流程：\r\n类型：确定-》总厚度-》耐磨层厚度：确定-》编号：确定-》库存'

CREATE TABLE `product_neworderspe` ( `neworderggid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '定制产品规格低', `productordertypeid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '定制产品类型', `orderthick` double(11,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '定制总厚度', `ordernmcthick` double(11,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '定制耐磨层', `orderbackcheck` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '背底选择', `orderczcheckid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '定制材质', `orderwenluid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '定制纹路', `orderggprice` double(11,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '定制规格的参考价格', `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `jicai` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `whatmian` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `fengzhou` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guangdu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`neworderggid`), KEY `typekey` (`productordertypeid`), KEY `wenluorderkey` (`orderwenluid`), KEY `caizhiorderkey` (`orderczcheckid`), KEY `jihoufengguangmian` (`orderthick`,`jicai`,`whatmian`,`fengzhou`,`guangdu`), KEY `jihoumian` (`orderthick`,`jicai`,`whatmian`), KEY `jihounmcmian` (`orderthick`,`ordernmcthick`,`jicai`,`whatmian`), CONSTRAINT `caizhiorderkey` FOREIGN KEY (`orderczcheckid`) REFERENCES `product_cz` (`czid`), CONSTRAINT `typekey` FOREIGN KEY (`productordertypeid`) REFERENCES `product_type` (`lxid`), CONSTRAINT `wenluorderkey` FOREIGN KEY (`orderwenluid`) REFERENCES `product_wenlu` (`wlid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `product_price` ( `pricesid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `productseriesid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `gradeid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `price` double(11,2) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `meijianprice` double(11,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `meidunprice` double(11,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `meimiprice` double(11,2) DEFAULT '0.00', PRIMARY KEY (`pricesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1255 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `product_specification` ( `ggid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '产品的信息', `producttypeid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '产品的类型', `thick` float(11,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '产品的厚度', `nmcthick` float(11,2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '产品的耐磨层厚度', `czcheckid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '材质选择表的外键', `wenluid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '纹路表的id外键', `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`ggid`), KEY `wenlu` (`wenluid`), KEY `leixing` (`producttypeid`), KEY `caizhi` (`czcheckid`), CONSTRAINT `caizhi` FOREIGN KEY (`czcheckid`) REFERENCES `product_cz` (`czid`), CONSTRAINT `leixing` FOREIGN KEY (`producttypeid`) REFERENCES `product_type` (`lxid`), CONSTRAINT `wenlu` FOREIGN KEY (`wenluid`) REFERENCES `product_wenlu` (`wlid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='产品的规格表'

CREATE TABLE `product_type` ( `lxid` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '产品的类型id', `name` varchar(25) NOT NULL COMMENT '产品的类型名称', `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`lxid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='产品的类型表'

CREATE TABLE `product_wenlu` ( `wlid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '纹路的id', `wlname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '纹路的名称', `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`wlid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='运动产品的纹路'

CREATE TABLE `productnum_photo` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `productnumid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `photo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `photobeizhu` longtext, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `productnummaterial` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `productnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `material` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `productnummaterialguanlian` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `productnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `material` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` double DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bumen` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `huanjiename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kcdizhi` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `productnummaterialguanlianone` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `num` double DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bumen` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `productnummaterialguanliantwo` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `upid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` double DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `productnummaterialtwo` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `upid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `projectpreparation` ( `preparationid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `projectname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `projectaddress` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `projectschedule` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `projectsquare` double(22,10) DEFAULT NULL, `projectseries` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `successrate` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `begintime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `endtime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `describe` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `starttime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `jxsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`preparationid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `qitagongxu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `huanjieid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `gongxuname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `meijianjine` double(12,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `fenchengpianshu` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `meipianjine` double(12,3) DEFAULT '0.000', `isjisuanrenshu` varchar(255) DEFAULT '否', `huanjiename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `isleijihuanjie` varchar(255) DEFAULT '否', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `ribaobiaoname` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhiwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `bili` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `banci` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhicheng` varchar(255) DEFAULT '员工', `xianshu` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `gerenbili` double(12,2) DEFAULT '1.00', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`), KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `rizhi` ( `rizhiid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rizhitype` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `rizhitime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `rizhicontext` longtext, `rizhiuser` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`rizhiid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6469 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `rukuleiji` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `seriesname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `seriesnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `productnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchantime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `juanshu` int(255) DEFAULT NULL, `mishu` double(255,2) DEFAULT NULL, `allweight` double(255,2) DEFAULT NULL, `pingmi` double(255,2) DEFAULT NULL, `xiliedanwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pianshu` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `productseriesid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `productname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kcid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=896 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `sales` ( `salesid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `saleszuid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `productnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `square` double(255,2) DEFAULT NULL, `squarenum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `salestime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `userid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `accountmanagerid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `pici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `productlocation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `money` double(255,2) DEFAULT NULL, `salesstatus` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `juanshu` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `zhihaoid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhihaoinfo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xxid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `unitprice` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `beizhu` longtext, `danwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT '/平米', PRIMARY KEY (`salesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=88 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `saleszu` ( `saleszuid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `allprice` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `allsquare` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `saleszuzhihaoinfo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `gysname` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `beizhu` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`saleszuid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=46 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `series` ( `seriesid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `seriesname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `seriesnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `seriesphoto` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `paixu` int(11) DEFAULT '100000', `pinpaipaixu` int(11) DEFAULT '100000', `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `productname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `description` longtext, `youwubianhao` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `xiliedanwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `yincang` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `mingxidanwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`seriesid`), UNIQUE KEY `seriesnum` (`seriesnum`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1036 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `shengchanhoudu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `houdu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `shengchanhuanjie` ( `shengchanhuanjieid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `shengchantypeid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhuanjiepaixu` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhuanjiename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhuanjieguige` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `shengchanhuanjiedanwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `isguanliankucun` varchar(255) DEFAULT '否', `isxianshishengchanjindu` varchar(255) DEFAULT '是', PRIMARY KEY (`shengchanhuanjieid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `shengchanorderzi` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `zuid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `kehuname` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `zhizaohaoma` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `xiangci` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `houdu` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `kuandu` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `nmchoudu` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `juanzhuang` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `yawen` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `bianhao` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `mishu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhishu` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `uv` varchar(11) DEFAULT ' ', `biaoqian` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `beiyin` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `yanse` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ckhou` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `suokoutype` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `caimonum` double(12,6) DEFAULT '0.000000', `jiaohuotime` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `xiadanren` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `yujitime` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `yuanyin` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `shangchuanxinxi` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `yuancailiaobeizhu` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `kehuphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `prefixstatus` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `suffixstatus` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `nowstatus` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `biaomianguangzedu` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `jicaiguigename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `daojiaoname` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `zhongdiliaoname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `leibiename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kehuxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `baozhuangfangshi` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `midu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanorderzibeizhu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pianmeihe` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `hemeituo` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `yishangchuannum` double DEFAULT '0', `xiadanstatus` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `headphoto` longtext, `shengchanhoudu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhuanjiedanwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=24 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `shengchanorderzu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `kehuname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kehuphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `allmishu` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `allzhishu` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `beizhu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhizaohaoma` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `headphoto` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=15 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `shengchanribao` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'id', `type` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '类型（木塑，石塑）', `huanjie` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '生产环节', `xinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '型号', `banci` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '班次', `pici` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '批次', `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT '0*0' COMMENT '规格', `beizhu` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '备注', `yawen` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '压纹', `jichuzongnum` double(12,6) DEFAULT '0.000000' COMMENT '挤出总产量', `chengpinnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT '0.000000' COMMENT '成品数量', `pvcfivexing` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT 'pvc5型', `zhonggaifour` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '重钙400目', `qinggai` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '轻钙', `zhuji` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '助剂', `feiliao` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '生产废料', `yinshuamo` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '印刷膜', `pvceightxing` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT 'pvc8型', `zhonggaieight` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '重钙800目', `cipinnum` double(12,6) DEFAULT '0.000000' COMMENT '次品数量', `huihuouv` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '回火或者uv', `getmaterialnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '领料数量', `miancengmaterial` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '面层材料', `miancengxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '面层型号', `miancengmaterialpici` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '面层材料批次', `jicaiguige` varchar(255) DEFAULT '0*0' COMMENT '基材规格', `miancengguige` varchar(255) DEFAULT '0*0' COMMENT '面层规格', `getmiancengnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '领用面层数量', `getjicainum` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '领用基材数量', `cipinmianceng` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '次品面层', `cipinmiancengyuanyin` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '次品面层不良原因', `cipinjicai` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '次品基材', `cipinjicaiyuanyin` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '次品基材原因', `kaicaoguige` varchar(255) DEFAULT '0*0' COMMENT '开槽规格', `fenqiechengpinnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '分切成品数量', `fenqiecipinnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '分切次品数量', `kaicaochengpinnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '开槽成品数', `kaicaocipinnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '开槽次品数', `getjingyindiannum` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '领用静音垫数量', `chengpinbaozhuangguige` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '成品包装规格', `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态', `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '生成时间', `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '用户名', `lilunnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '理论数量', `nmc` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '耐磨层', `huiliao` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ' COMMENT '回料', `midu` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `shengyunum` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cipinyuanyin` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `aokang` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `taose` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `qipao` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `zazhi` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `chongpian` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `zhehen` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `linmo` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `jingdian` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `guahen` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `dong` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `huai` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `secha` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `qita` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `tuoceng` double(12,2) DEFAULT '0.00', `kehuphone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhongdiliaoname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `yansename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `upshengchanribaoid` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `mishu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kehuxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `chanliangyejiheji` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cipinyejiheji` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `qitagongxuyejiheji` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `beizhuinfo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `butiejine` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `shenhe` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `baocunnametext` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `xingguangongxu` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `xingguangongxuyejiheji` varchar(255) DEFAULT ' ', `cipinyuanyincontent` longtext, `qitagongxucontent` longtext, `xingguangongxucontent` longtext, `pingfenname` longtext, `pingfenjine` double(12,4) DEFAULT '0.0000', `pingfen` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `jisuancishu` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `jisuanrenname` longtext, `ribaokcid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `pianmeihe` double DEFAULT NULL, `isjiaban` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cailiao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `peifang` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhuanjiedanwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanhoudu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `gongjianame` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `getmaterialname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `getmaterialpici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `getmaterialxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `getmaterialdanweiname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xinghaomaterialpici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xinghaodanweiname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xinghaoxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xinghaomaterialname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `peifangmaterialpici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `peifangdanweiname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `peifangxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `peifangmaterialname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ispeifangmatchtype` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `materialnamematerialname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialnamexinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialnamedanweiname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialnamematerialpici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `hegelv` double(12,2) DEFAULT '1.00', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=76 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `shengchantype` ( `shengchantypeid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `shengchantypename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `peizhi` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`shengchantypeid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `shengchanyeji` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhiwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `yeji` double(24,2) DEFAULT NULL, `ribaoid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `huanjie` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `count` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `yuanyin` longtext, `bumen` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `caimoxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `shenhe` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `banci` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `shengchanzhuangtai` ( `shengchanzhuangtaiid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `shengchanhuanjieid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `shengchanzhuangtainame` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`shengchanzhuangtaiid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `shichangdiaochareport` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `quyu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `series` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `firm` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `firmjianjie` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `goodproduct` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhanyoulv` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `zhimingdu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `localseries` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `quanguoseries` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `xiaoshoue` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `youshi` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `lieshi` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pinggu` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `shopcart` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `productnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '产品编号', `squarenum` double DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发货数量', `xianhuoandfucai` int(11) DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '现货还是辅材', `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `photo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `seriesname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `shouhoureport` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kehuname` longtext, `kehuphone` longtext, `address` longtext, `num` longtext, `beizhu` longtext, `productnum` longtext, `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `sonpurchase` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `fatherpurchaseid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `productnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `productlocation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sonnum` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sonprice` double(24,2) DEFAULT NULL, `pici` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `squarestring` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `purchaseprice` double(24,2) DEFAULT NULL, `kuwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kcid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `timechuo` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `firmname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `mingxidanwei` varchar(255) DEFAULT '米', `piancai` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=13 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `suokoutype` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `suokoutypename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `tardyzu` ( `tardyzuid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `allprice` double(12,6) DEFAULT '0.000000', `realallprice` double(12,6) DEFAULT '0.000000', `paytime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `getmoneystary` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `jxsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `tardyzustatus` int(11) DEFAULT '12', `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `ddids` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`tardyzuid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=89 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `type` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `typename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `typematerial` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `shengchantype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `materialxinghao` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` double(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `material` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `typematerialtwo` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `upid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `guige` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `uv` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uvname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `whtable` ( `whtableid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `orderwidth` double(11,2) DEFAULT NULL, `orderheight` double(11,2) DEFAULT NULL, `newordertypeid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `jicai` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `logo` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`whtableid`), UNIQUE KEY `hhhda` (`orderwidth`,`orderheight`,`newordertypeid`,`jicai`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `xinghao` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `houdu` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `kuandu` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `nmchoudu` double(12,6) DEFAULT NULL, `ckhou` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `yangbenreport` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `kehuname` longtext, `kehuphone` longtext, `address` longtext, `squarestring` longtext, `beizhu` longtext, `status` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `yanse` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `yansename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `yawen` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `yawenname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
CREATE TABLE `zhongdiliao` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `zhongdiliaoname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
